remarks: An assertion holding in atomic orthomodular lattices that is equivalent to the exchange axiom.  Proposition 3.2.17 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 66. (Contributed by NM, 24-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atoml.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
atomli $p |- ( B e. HAtoms -> ( ( A vH B ) i^i ( _|_ ` A ) ) e. ( HAtoms u. { 0H } ) ) $.
